availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel L. Blakeman (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Green County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary M. Moore Blakeman in Barren County, Kentucky, in October 1851. Father of Daniel J. Blakeman and Junius H. Blakeman. Married to Sarah A. Moore Blakeman in Green County, Kentucky, on February 8, 1863. Resident of Green County in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 108A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 555.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kansas, Douglas County, Eudora Township, p. 254B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Barren County Marriages, Film 000209757.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Green County Marriages, Film 001877085.
